content.rendered:
Experience CAGBC signature events

Invest in your career with education, events and training from the experts at CAGBC. We offer programming CAGBC programming goes beyond green building education and training. Our signature events offer timely and insightful discussion on the trends, barriers and innovations impacting green building. Anchored by Building Lasting Change, Canada’s premier green building conference, CAGBC events can’t be missed. 

Stay up-to-date with our event calendar.

Accelerating to Zero

The building sector has a significant role to play in Canada’s climate commitments. Meeting the goals of 2030 and 2050 means transiting to zero carbon buildings. CAGBC’s Accelerating to Zero events are designed to help the sector take the necessary steps toward a zero-carbon future.  

Innovation Series 

Optimizing the design construction and operation of energy efficient and zero-carbon green buildings is critical for Canada to achieve a low-carbon future. Each year, CAGBC’s Innovation Series brings leading subject matter expert together to explore the latest strategies and solutions for highly-efficient, healthy and resilient buildings.  

Manufacturer’s Kickstarter

This 4-part manufacturer-only series guides organizations through the challenges, processes and benefits of product transparency such as life-cycle assessments, environmental product declarations (EPD) and Health Product Declarations (HPD).  

Building Lasting Change

CAGBC plays host to Canada’s premier green building conference, Building Lasting Change. Learn from visionaries and leaders in sustainability from Canada and around the world. BLC attendees participate in exciting discussions, learn about the latest innovative approaches and practical solutions, grow their professional network. 

Attend a live event

Learn from industry leaders as we explore key topics shaping green building in Canada.
